content: *make this child s pullover as shown for a girl for a boy just eliminate the open popcorn pattern and use plain double_crochet lionbrand com * lion brand pattern # cjif-childspullover corrections applied feb 12 2006 skill level intermediate size child 4 child 5-6 finished chest measurement 28 inches #450 jiffy 4 balls crochet hook - size i-9 crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm *free registration at lionbrand com required to access pattern *
